titleInfo.title: 'File 6/78 Necessity to start leper settlement at Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-7; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), the Political Agency in Bahrain, and the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf at Bushire. The correspondence concerns the idea of a leper settlement in Bahrain and the question of repatriation of Persian lepers in the country.Folios 8-11 are internal office notes.
